name: 7cups
headline: 7 Cups is an emotional support service that matches up people thatâ¦
description:
7 Cups of Tea is an on-demand emotional health and well-being service. Our bridging technology anonymously & securely connects real people to real listeners in one-on-one chat.

Anyone who wants to talk about whatever is on their mind can quickly reach out to a trained, compassionate listener through our network. We have hundreds of listeners who come from all walks of life and have diverse experiences.

People connect with listeners on 7 Cups of Tea for all kinds of reasons, from big existential thoughts to small, day-to-day things that we all experience. Unlike talking to family or friends, a 7 Cups of Tea listener doesnât judge or try to solve problems and say what to do. Our listeners just listen. They understand. They give you the space you need to help you clear your head.

# Need someone to talk to? Our counselors and listeners are standing by.
7 Cups connects you to caring listeners for free emotional support.
[Get started](http://7cups.com/</welcome/>) [Considering therapy?](http://7cups.com/</online-therapy/signup/>)
## Free 24/7 Chat
7 Cups connects you to caring listeners for free emotional support.
## Affordable Therapy Online
Confidential online therapy & coaching with licensed therapists for a low monthly fee.
## Grow at Your Own Pace
Explore self help guides & growth paths for proven tips and advice on how to feel better.
[ ![The Wall Street Journal](http://d37v7cqg82mgxu.cloudfront.net/img/home/the-wallstreet-journal-gray700.svg) ![The New Yorker](http://d37v7cqg82mgxu.cloudfront.net/img/home/the-new-yorker-gray700.svg) ![TechCrunch](http://d37v7cqg82mgxu.cloudfront.net/img/home/techcrunch-gray700.svg) ![USA Today](http://d37v7cqg82mgxu.cloudfront.net/img/home/usa-today-gray700.svg) ![Entrepeneur](http://d37v7cqg82mgxu.cloudfront.net/img/home/entrepreneur-gray700.svg) ](http://7cups.com/</about/press.php>)
## The world’s largest mental health community.
For over 10 years we’ve been the place to go to for help, compassion and friendship. Supportive friends and listeners are just a few clicks away.
![](http://d37v7cqg82mgxu.cloudfront.net/img/home/Icon_ChatHeart.png)
1,818,598,937
Messages, chat, and therapy sessions
![](http://d37v7cqg82mgxu.cloudfront.net/img/home/Icon_WorldHeart.png)
72,298,116
Lives touched around the globe
![](http://d37v7cqg82mgxu.cloudfront.net/img/home/Icon_Target.png)
563,378
Trained listeners providing support
![Online therapy from a licensed profressional therapists](http://d37v7cqg82mgxu.cloudfront.net/img/home/professional-therapist.jpg)
Kare M
Licensed Professional Counselor, MS, LCMHC, NCC
Hey, how are you feeling today? I’m really proud of the work we’ve been doing together this week. Remember to take 5mins today to try that reflection exercise we went through.
2 mins ago 
###### MENTAL HEALTH THERAPISTS
## Get support with online therapy
Want a little extra help? You can get ongoing support, treatment and guidance from a licensed therapist when you sign up for online therapy.
![HIPAA Compliant](http://d37v7cqg82mgxu.cloudfront.net/img/home/hipaa-compliant.svg)
![Secure Communications](http://d37v7cqg82mgxu.cloudfront.net/img/home/secure-communications.svg)
![SOC 2 Type II Certified](http://d37v7cqg82mgxu.cloudfront.net/img/home/soc2-type2-certified.svg)
[Get started](http://7cups.com/</online-therapy/signup/>)
![A walk in nature can be rejuvinating](http://d37v7cqg82mgxu.cloudfront.net/img/home/backbacking-in-the-outdoors.jpg)
## An Online Therapy Community That Many Call Home
No matter who you are or what you’ve going through, you’re not alone. There are many people who are just like you at 7 Cups. This is a place where you’ll be heard and cared for. We might be strangers on the surface, but underneath we’re just the friends you haven’t met yet.
[Get started](http://7cups.com/</welcome/>)
## 7 Cups: The Award-Winning Leader in Mental Health
Widely recognized as the Most Highly Awarded and Recognized Leader in Mental Health, 7 Cups empowers individuals and organizations to prioritize mental well-being.

###### 24/7 Live Support
## Anonymous virtual chat with caring listeners
Need to talk to someone? Our trained volunteer listeners are available 24/7 to give emotional support over online chat. It’s anonymous and completely free. When you need someone to talk to, we’re here to listen and help you feel better.
###### Support Groups
## Community is at the heart of 7 Cups
You can find support and friendship in chat rooms and forums for many issues, like depression, anxiety, relationships, LGBTQ+ and more. Ask for help, join a scheduled group support session, or share your own wisdom and life experience to help others along the way. We’re all in this together.
Day 3: What made you feel proud today?
Daily Reflections
45 mins remaining
Sharing Circle with Ruby
Sharing Circle
30 mins remaining
Exploring anxiety with Jennifer PhD
Exploration Garden
15 mins remaining
###### Compassionate AI
## Meet Noni, your AI counsellor
Looking for therapy that is private and judgement-free? Noni is trained to listen, help you explore and never judge. She can help you identify triggers, gain insight and problem solve. Chat with her now!
![](http://d37v7cqg82mgxu.cloudfront.net/img/noniCup.jpg)
Can you tell me more about why you feel that way?
![](http://d37v7cqg82mgxu.cloudfront.net/img/home/member-texting-noni.jpg)
It started getting worse when I moved cities. Now I feel anxious all the time.
![](http://d37v7cqg82mgxu.cloudfront.net/img/noniCup.jpg)
Big life changes like moving city are not necessarily easy. You’re doing well to take such a brave step.
![](http://d37v7cqg82mgxu.cloudfront.net/img/home/member-texting-noni.jpg)
Thanks. I think I’m ready to try that breathing technique you suggested.
###### Forums and Self Help Guides
## Nurture your mental health, try self help made easy
Discover your personal growth path and learn new coping skills to grow stronger each day. Each step on your path is a simple self help activity, designed to help you feel better.
## We’re here for teens too
Are you 13-17 years old? We have listeners available especially for teens, so you can chat confidentially whenever you need to. You can also join our lively teen community forums and chat rooms to share with peers who understand what you’re going through. Get support and make new friends along the way.
[Get started](http://7cups.com/</welcome/>)
![](http://d37v7cqg82mgxu.cloudfront.net/img/banner-quoter-left.svg)
Winner
Best Free Online Therapy Service for Teens
![Healthline](http://d37v7cqg82mgxu.cloudfront.net/img/awards/healthline.svg)
![](http://d37v7cqg82mgxu.cloudfront.net/img/banner-quoter-right.svg)
![](http://d37v7cqg82mgxu.cloudfront.net/img/banner-quoter-left.svg)
Winner
Best Online Therapy Programs for Kids

![](http://d37v7cqg82mgxu.cloudfront.net/img/banner-quoter-right.svg)
###### Find a Therapist Now
## Meet the 7 Cups licensed providers
We’ll match you with the therapist that’s right for you. Or pick your therapist from our directory.
[Get started](http://7cups.com/</online-therapy/signup/>)
![Therapist Jennifer Geib](http://d37v7cqg82mgxu.cloudfront.net/img/home/Jennifer-Geib.jpg)
Jennifer Geib
Clinical Social Work/Therapist, LCSWR
My therapy is non-judgmental and focuses on emotions and motivation to accomplish your goals or overcome your struggles.
![Therapist Maria Anisia Dascalescu Cocan](http://d37v7cqg82mgxu.cloudfront.net/img/home/Maria-Anisia-Dascalescu-Cocan.jpg)
Maria Anisia Dascalescu Cocan
Marriage & Family Therapist, MA
Therapy slogan: Confidentiality, respect and professionalism!
![Therapist Lisa Meighan](http://d37v7cqg82mgxu.cloudfront.net/img/home/Lisa-Meighan.jpg)
Lisa Meighan
Counselor, MSc Psychology
I work using an eclectic style of psychotherapy and we work according to your goals, preferences and needs using evidence-based practices.
![Online therapy from anywhere](http://d37v7cqg82mgxu.cloudfront.net/img/home/online-therapy-from-laptop.jpg)
###### How Therapy Works
1
Get matched with a mental health professional
2
Develop a treatment plan with your therapist
3
Receive support, guidance and develop new coping skills to stay on track with your 7 Cups treatment plan.
![Online therapy that fits your needs](http://d37v7cqg82mgxu.cloudfront.net/img/home/licensed-therapists-for-any-issue.jpg)
Depression  Anxiety  Relationships  OCD  Life transitions  Personality disorders  Parenting  Family issues  LGBTQIA+  Loneliness 
###### Therapy for Any Issue
## Our licensed therapists are standing by to help
They are experts in many conditions, treatment approaches and navigating life’s challenges. Your therapist will provide:
  * Daily messaging support to help you through tough moments.
  * Goals and a plan to get there.
  * Tailored guidance to make better decisions, improve your habits, overcome challenges and more.


![7 Cups](http://d37v7cqg82mgxu.cloudfront.net/img/cup_cover.png) 7 Cups | In-office  
---|---  
Credentialed therapist  
Messaging any time  
Chat sessions  
Phone sessions  
Video sessions  
Easy scheduling  
Growth Paths  
Group sessions  
Smart provider matching  
Easy to switch providers  
###### Affordable and Accessible
## Counseling that works
Online therapy is proven to be highly effective. With the added benefits of being easier to access and more affordable than in-office fees.
[Get started](http://7cups.com/</online-therapy/signup/>)
![7 Cups Emotional Support](http://7cups.com/img/7clogodark.svg)
##### **Don’t miss a message!**
###### The 7 Cups app is available on iOS and Android

# Need someone to talk to? Our counselors and listeners are standing by.
7 Cups connects you to caring listeners for free emotional support.
Get started⟨4⟩ Considering therapy?⟨9⟩
## Free 24/7 Chat
7 Cups connects you to caring listeners for free emotional support.
## Affordable Therapy Online
Confidential online therapy & coaching with licensed therapists for a low monthly fee.
## Grow at Your Own Pace
Explore self help guides & growth paths for proven tips and advice on how to feel better.
 ![The Wall Street Journal⟨12⟩ ![The New Yorker⟨13⟩] ![TechCrunch⟨14⟩] ![USA Today⟨15⟩] ![Entrepeneur⟨16⟩] ](http://7cups.com/</about/press.php>)
## The world’s largest mental health community.
For over 10 years we’ve been the place to go to for help, compassion and friendship. Supportive friends and listeners are just a few clicks away.
![](http://d37v7cqg82mgxu.cloudfront.net/img/home/Icon_ChatHeart.png)

###### MENTAL HEALTH THERAPISTS

Want a little extra help? You can get ongoing support, treatment and guidance from a licensed therapist when you sign up for online therapy.

No matter who you are or what you’ve going through, you’re not alone. There are many people who are just like you at 7 Cups. This is a place where you’ll be heard and cared for. We might be strangers on the surface, but underneath we’re just the friends you haven’t met yet.

###### 24/7 Live Support
## Anonymous virtual chat with caring listeners
Need to talk to someone? Our trained volunteer listeners are available 24/7 to give emotional support over online chat. It’s anonymous and completely free. When you need someone to talk to, we’re here to listen and help you feel better.
###### Support Groups
## Community is at the heart of 7 Cups
You can find support and friendship in chat rooms and forums for many issues, like depression, anxiety, relationships, LGBTQ+ and more. Ask for help, join a scheduled group support session, or share your own wisdom and life experience to help others along the way. We’re all in this together.
Day 3: What made you feel proud today?

###### Compassionate AI
## Meet Noni, your AI counsellor
Looking for therapy that is private and judgement-free? Noni is trained to listen, help you explore and never judge. She can help you identify triggers, gain insight and problem solve. Chat with her now!
![](http://d37v7cqg82mgxu.cloudfront.net/img/noniCup.jpg)
Can you tell me more about why you feel that way?
![](http://d37v7cqg82mgxu.cloudfront.net/img/home/member-texting-noni.jpg)
It started getting worse when I moved cities. Now I feel anxious all the time.
![](http://d37v7cqg82mgxu.cloudfront.net/img/noniCup.jpg)
Big life changes like moving city are not necessarily easy. You’re doing well to take such a brave step.
![](http://d37v7cqg82mgxu.cloudfront.net/img/home/member-texting-noni.jpg)
Thanks. I think I’m ready to try that breathing technique you suggested.
###### Forums and Self Help Guides
## Nurture your mental health, try self help made easy
Discover your personal growth path and learn new coping skills to grow stronger each day. Each step on your path is a simple self help activity, designed to help you feel better.
## We’re here for teens too
Are you 13-17 years old? We have listeners available especially for teens, so you can chat confidentially whenever you need to. You can also join our lively teen community forums and chat rooms to share with peers who understand what you’re going through. Get support and make new friends along the way.

###### How Therapy Works
1
Get matched with a mental health professional
2
Develop a treatment plan with your therapist
3
Receive support, guidance and develop new coping skills to stay on track with your 7 Cups treatment plan.
![Online therapy that fits your needs⟨33⟩]
Depression  Anxiety  Relationships  OCD  Life transitions  Personality disorders  Parenting  Family issues  LGBTQIA+  Loneliness 
###### Therapy for Any Issue
## Our licensed therapists are standing by to help
They are experts in many conditions, treatment approaches and navigating life’s challenges. Your therapist will provide:
  * Daily messaging support to help you through tough moments.
  * Goals and a plan to get there.
  * Tailored guidance to make better decisions, improve your habits, overcome challenges and more.

###### Affordable and Accessible
## Counseling that works
Online therapy is proven to be highly effective. With the added benefits of being easier to access and more affordable than in-office fees.

generated_description:
**7 Cups: A Modern Approach to Emotional Well-Being**

**Overview**  
Founded in Virginia Beach, VA, 7 Cups started as "7 Cups of Tea" and has evolved into a leading platform for on-demand emotional support. As part of Y Combinator's Batch S13, the company’s mission is straightforward: to help people feel heard during tough times by connecting them with trained listeners who provide compassionate, non-judgmental support.

**What They Do**  
At its core, 7 Cups connects individuals seeking someone to talk to with trained listeners via an anonymous chat platform. This service is available 24/7, allowing anyone to reach out whenever they need. The conversations range from addressing deep existential issues to discussing everyday concerns, all without the pressure of judgment or the need for solutions—just a space to vent, reflect, and be heard. 

The platform not only facilitates these interactions but also offers online therapy with licensed professionals for users looking for more structured support. Additionally, it promotes community by providing forums and support groups on various topics, including anxiety, depression, and relationships, ensuring that users can find their tribe.

**Key Features**  
- **Free Chat**: Immediate access to listeners.
- **Affordable Therapy**: Access to licensed therapists for personalized guidance at a low monthly fee.
- **Diverse Support Options**: Self-help guides, community forums, and special programs for teenagers.
- **Inclusivity**: Multiple languages supported, making emotional support accessible globally.

**Achievements**  
7 Cups has built a solid reputation, as evidenced by its stellar ratings—4.5 on the App Store and 4.7 on Trustpilot. Over its decade-long journey, it has facilitated staggering interactions: over 1.8 billion messages exchanged and touched over 72 million lives. This impressive impact has not gone unnoticed, with the organization receiving numerous awards for its innovative approaches to mental health, including recognition from the World Economic Forum and healthcare design awards.

**Team & Culture**  
With a compact team of just 11 members, 7 Cups maintains a culture of compassion and accessibility. They foster a community-oriented approach, valuing both the mental well-being of users and the empowerment of their volunteer listeners.

**Conclusion**  
If you’re in need of someone to talk to, 7 Cups offers a blend of community support and professional guidance, all rooted in empathy and understanding. Check them out at [7cups.com](http://7cups.com), and remember: sometimes, all you need is a cup of kindness.
